description: {"blocks":[{"key":"e9n6g","text":"PURPOSE: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"apaoe","text":"This protocol explains the metadata requirements for the following two protocols:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":81}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"757qr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b2no8","text":"1. SARS-CoV-2 NCBI submission protocol: SRA, BioSample, and BioProject ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":71}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":3,"length":67}],"data":{}},{"key":"4uljn","text":"Step-by-step instructions for establishing a new NCBI laboratory submission account and for creating and linking a new BioProject to an existing umbrella effort.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9mbo1","text":"SARS-CoV-2 raw data submission to SRA (Sequence Read Archive) and metadata to BioSample.  Users can modify this protocol to just create a BioSample with no linked raw data. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2tpj3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"frmcq","text":"2. SARS-CoV-2 NCBI consensus submission protocol: GenBank","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":57}],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":3,"length":54}],"data":{}},{"key":"541af","text":"     Required: established BioProject and BioSamples","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":5,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cvmgc","text":"Submit SARS-CoV-2 assemblies to NCBI GenBank, linking to existing BioProject, BioSamples, and raw data.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6sh1g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ojqp","text":"Version history:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5mgkq","text":"V5: Updated metadata templates (BioSample) for minor edit","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"3D37C252681511ECBA2B0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.protocols.io/edit/sars-cov-2-ncbi-submission-protocol-sra-biosample-br8ym9xw"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"3D37C2C5681511ECBA2B0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.protocols.io/edit/sars-cov-2-ncbi-consensus-submission-protocol-genb-b3bnqime/description"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aftm3","text":"Populate SRA’s batch metadata table:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":36}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dq2qt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cmkv7","text":"Download custom version containing the PHA4GE pick-lists and controlled vocabulary:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"da21p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"82d3a","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fl97n","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e4lgn","text":"Follow the PHA4GE contextual metadata SOP and source GitHub repository for guidance in populating the template.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":18,"length":23},{"key":2,"offset":53,"length":17}],"data":{}},{"key":"3lvnl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"77ns9","text":"PRO TIPS:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1fvu","text":"If you have sequences to submit that belong to more than one BioProject, create a separate submission + metadata table for each of your BioProjects. ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"358ip","text":"Entering fastq filenames in the spreadsheet: On a Mac, you can directly copy the file names from the folder into a spreadsheet. This is not possible on a PC using copy and paste but can be done with some command-line operation. ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":43}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"efpsv","text":"Finally, it is important to develop a QA/QC step to make sure the files are associated with the correct sample name. For example, use a left function in excel to strip of the appended text in the file name and then use the exact match to make sure the name matches the sample name.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"file","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"D1AB8A30680811EC978A95E63A77C43A","height":0,"id":195838,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.spreadsheetml.sheet","original_name":"SRA_template_PHA4GE-V3.xlsx","placeholder":"https://www.protocols.io/img/extensions/xlsx.png","raw_source":"","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/f9h89yen.xlsx","type":5,"width":0}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"DE10A88D680411ECBA2B0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.protocols.io/view/pha4ge-contextual-metadata-sop-btpznmp6"}},"2":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"EE51B6D0681411EC978A95E63A77C43A","url":"https://github.com/pha4ge/SARS-CoV-2-Contextual-Data-Specification/tree/version_3_dev"}}}}
